greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of orbits of length n in map whose periodic points are A000051.
link: Y. Puri and T. Ward, Arithmetic and growth of periodic orbits, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 4 (2001), #01.2.1.
Yash Puri and Thomas Ward, A dynamical property unique to the Lucas sequence, Fibonacci Quarterly, Volume 39, Number 5 (November 2001), pp. 398-402.
example: a(3)=2 since the 3rd term of A000051 is 9 and the first term is 3.
xref: Cf. A001037, A059966 (both nearly identical to this sequence).
results.author: _Thomas Ward_
ext: A048578 replaced by A000051 in name and formula by _Michel Marcus_, Sep 11 2017
